structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.history: Repealed 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 34, sec. 5. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2849, 2850.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Locating parks; accepting gifts; title to park property; tax exemption; conveyance to city.
